evidence.claim: Haven Health Services utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure.
The company adheres to HIPAA compliance in its healthcare solutions.
Haven Health Services mentions the use of FHIR for interoperability in health data.
Integration patterns for data streaming are referenced in their technical documentation.
Details on the use of X12 formats for transactions can be found in their developer portal.

icp.icp_reason: Company handles health data exchanges and operates within HIPAA and X12 standards.
